p: IgG binding assays were followed by neutralization testing as the former is more sensitive and the latter more specific for detection of flavivirus infections.[ 23, 24] All ZIKV IgG positive delivery samples were tested by eFRNT, and the cut off for discriminating prior ZIKV infection from ZIKV-na√Øve was eFRNT = 200. For probable prior ZIKV infection, paired pre-natal and birth blood samples were tested by FRNT and IgM ELISA to confirm the ZIKV infection and to estimate the timing of ZIKV infection in relation to pregnancy ( Fig 1).
